Package com.deezer.sdk.network.connect

This package contains Java classes used to handle the OAuth connection with Deezer.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeezerConnect
    Provides methods to connect and logout a user, ease requests using the Deezer API.
    SessionStore
    Allows to store and retrieve OAuth credentials for : sharing the credentials between activities in a single app ; sharing credentials between successive launches of the app in order to prevent user to have to relog.

Package com.deezer.sdk.network.connect Description

This package contains Java classes used to handle the OAuth connection with Deezer.
